title: Hamden Joe Castiglione , voice of the Red Sox , is taking his place in Cooperstown ; you can believe it
body_text:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...
Hamden's Joe Castiglione's voice has become synonymous with the Red Sox, and the sound of summer in New England. Next month, he will take his place among the legends of baseball broadcasting in Cooperstown.
